Author: attick, perchbird & Speedas
Name: Title Edit
Punchline: Create, share, and shuffle custom title screens and character select screen for FFXIV.
Description:
Create your own custom title screen of your favorite location in-game, and open the game right up to that spot every time.
Includes a number of preinstalled title screens for you to use or get inspiration from, and an easy to use importer to use title screens that others have shared!
Character select supports recording your last visited location, per character display setting and even displaying yourself on a mount.
